entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Esther
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esther 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -27.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -31.2°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
